mcp.title: MCP Server

mcp.setup.claudeCode: Run this command in your terminal to register the MCP server:
mcp.setup.vscode: Open your User Settings JSON (Ctrl+Shift+P or Cmd+Shift+P) and add this configuration:
mcp.setup.cursor: Go to Cursor Settings > MCP and add a new server with this configuration:
mcp.setup.other: Use this endpoint URL to connect any MCP-compatible client:
